statements: DELETE FROM instrument_popularity WHERE popularity_score < 50 AND date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM instrument_popularity WHERE instrument_name = 'Guitar' AND popularity_score > 75;
DELETE FROM instrument_popularity WHERE year_issued < 2015 AND instrument_id = 2;
DELETE FROM instrument_sales WHERE sale_id = 100 AND sale_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM InstrumentPopularity WHERE instrument_id = 1 AND popularity_score > 50;
DELETE FROM InstrumentHistory WHERE instrument_id = 2 AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
